text: Anthony D. "Tony" DiNozzo Jr.Season 3, Episode 9 "Frame Up" is a fictional character from the CBS Television series NCIS. He is played by Michael Weatherly. Before joining NCIS as the Major Case Response Team senior field agent, he was a police detective in Baltimore. In January 2016, Weatherly and CBS said that Season 13 would be DiNozzo's last as a regular part of the show. == References == Category:Television characters
title: Anthony DiNozzo
